aboutusintro.title: About 123 Brass
aboutusintro.subtitle: Precision Forging Manufacturing in Jamnagar
aboutusintro.description: Founded in Jamnagar, 123 Brass specializes in high-quality brass and steel forging manufacturing. We provide comprehensive custom solutions for diverse industrial applications, combining traditional craftsmanship with modern engineering techniques.
